alert.note: Alert for Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cedar, northeastern Johnson, southwestern Jones and southeastern Linn Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lisbon, or near Mechanicsville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tipton, West Branch, Mechanicsville, Stanwood, Mount Vernon, Lisbon, Morley, Rochester, Buchanan, Clarence, Springdale, Cedar Valley, Cedar Bluff, Sutliff, Cedar Valley Park, Palisades-Kepler State Park, Tipton Matthews Airport and Cedar County Fairgrounds. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 256 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
